description:
Everything you need to get your canoe from A to sea. This kit has all the pieces to put a canoe safely on the roof of your car.

  • 4 foam blocks connect to your canoe’s gunwales and then rest on the roof of your car. Note: make sure the areas of your car’s roof that the foam blocks rest against is very clean, or you could mar the paint
  • 1 x 5m webbing strap with locking buckle
  • 2 x V-straps to secure your canoe’s bow and stern to your car’s bumpers
  • Mesh carrying bag keeps everything neatly together when not in use
name: Level Six Canoe Transport Kit
